5100.verse: لَقَدْ|Certainly|78|86|3466$أَرْسَلْنَا|We sent|82|98|1342$رُسُلَنَا|Our Messengers|125|141|8071$بِٱلْبَيِّنَـٰتِ|with clear proofs|131|147|880$وَأَنزَلْنَا|and We sent down|144|160|536$مَعَهُمُ|with them|86|94|1857$ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ|the Scripture|107|128|451$وَٱلْمِيزَانَ|and the Balance|127|170|6182$لِيَقُومَ|that may establish|143|186|16678$ٱلنَّاسُ|the people|90|133|112$بِٱلْقِسْطِ‌ۖ|justice.|86|108|2700$وَأَنزَلْنَا|And We sent down|145|162|536$ٱلْحَدِيدَ|[the] iron,|88|121|14209$فِيهِ|wherein|71|104|32$بَأْسٌ|(is) power|87|120|16679$شَدِيدٌ|mighty|67|100|2613$وَمَنَـٰفِعُ|and benefits|102|118|1918$لِلنَّاسِ|for the people,|118|146|787$وَلِيَعْلَمَ ٱللَّهُ|and so that Allah may make evident|258|313|3313$مَن|(he) who|80|135|76$يَنصُرُهُۥ|helps Him|103|131|12116$وَرُسُلَهُۥ|and His Messengers,|155|166|16680$بِٱلْغَيْبِ‌ۚ|unseen.|86|107|36$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|91|58$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|74|184$قَوِىٌّ|(is) All-Strong|113|134|7318$عَزِيزٌ|All-Mighty.|91|102|1827$

5101.verse: وَلَقَدْ|And certainly|107|114|640$أَرْسَلْنَا|We sent|82|96|1342$نُوحًا|Nuh|66|80|6485$وَإِبْرَٲهِيمَ|and Ibrahim,|105|120|13593$وَجَعَلْنَا|and We placed|118|132|4805$فِى|in|48|62|89$ذُرِّيَّتِهِمَا|their offspring|112|119|14688$ٱلنُّبُوَّةَ|Prophethood|103|109|13619$وَٱلْكِتَـٰبَ‌ۖ|and the Scripture;|142|155|13620$فَمِنْهُم|and among them|130|143|2258$مُّهْتَدٍ‌ۖ|(is) a guided one,|137|150|16681$وَكَثِيرٌ|but most|79|92|5130$مِّنْهُمْ|of them|71|77|730$فَـٰسِقُونَ|(are) defiantly disobediently.|211|211|5081$

5102.verse: ثُمَّ|Then|53|59|293$قَفَّيْنَا|We sent|75|88|16682$عَلَىٰٓ|on|63|76|52$ءَاثَـٰرِهِم|their footsteps|118|131|5007$بِرُسُلِنَا|Our Messengers|125|138|16683$وَقَفَّيْنَا|and We followed|129|142|828$بِعِيسَى|with Isa,|85|91|5008$ٱبْنِ|son|52|58|5009$مَرْيَمَ|(of) Maryam,|106|118|833$وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُ|and We gave him|134|146|5010$ٱلْإِنجِيلَ|the Injeel.|90|102|5011$وَجَعَلْنَا|And We placed|119|132|4805$فِى|in|48|60|89$قُلُوبِ|(the) hearts|101|107|3365$ٱلَّذِينَ|(of) those who|119|142|20$ٱتَّبَعُوهُ|followed him|101|148|2988$رَأْفَةً|compassion|96|143|16684$وَرَحْمَةً|and mercy.|94|141|4357$وَرَهْبَانِيَّةً|But monasticism|127|150|16685$ٱبْتَدَعُوهَا|they innovated -|132|140|16686$مَا|not|42|58|262$كَتَبْنَـٰهَا|We prescribed it|128|144|16687$عَلَيْهِمْ|for them -|88|104|22$إِلَّا|only|47|63|86$ٱبْتِغَآءَ|seeking|76|92|1817$رِضْوَٲنِ|(the) pleasure|114|122|16688$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah,|86|100|2$فَمَا|but not|69|98|132$رَعَوْهَا|they observed it|129|158|16689$حَقَّ|(with) right|95|124|1122$رِعَايَتِهَا‌ۖ|observance.|101|130|16690$فَـَٔـاتَيْنَا|So We gave|100|114|16691$ٱلَّذِينَ|those who|89|109|20$ءَامَنُواْ|believed|82|122|84$مِنْهُمْ|among them|101|141|730$أَجْرَهُمْ‌ۖ|their reward,|105|145|10136$وَكَثِيرٌ|but most|79|119|5130$مِّنْهُمْ|of them|71|91|730$فَـٰسِقُونَ|(are) defiantly disobediently.|211|211|5081$

5103.verse: يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ|O you who believe!|197|219|7177$ٱتَّقُواْ|Fear|64|109|2492$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|98|184$وَءَامِنُواْ|and believe|96|141|423$بِرَسُولِهِۦ|in His Messenger;|136|158|16692$يُؤْتِكُمْ|He will give you|123|129|7386$كِفْلَيْنِ|double portion|114|127|16693$مِن|of|50|63|53$رَّحْمَتِهِۦ|His Mercy|98|111|6470$وَيَجْعَل|and He will make|130|143|12713$لَّكُمْ|for you|67|80|207$نُورًا|a light,|66|72|5814$تَمْشُونَ|you will walk|103|117|16694$بِهِۦ|with it,|67|96|204$وَيَغْفِرْ|and He will forgive|141|170|2773$لَكُمْ‌ۚ|you.|51|80|207$وَٱللَّهُ|And Allah|81|110|167$غَفُورٌ|(is) Oft-Forgiving,|139|153|1499$رَّحِيمٌ|Most Merciful.|113|113|1294$

5104.verse: لِّئَلَّا|So that|70|77|1334$يَعْلَمَ|may know|86|101|10046$أَهْلُ|(the) People|102|117|3164$ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ|(of) the Book|108|123|811$أَلَّا|that not|75|90|2011$يَقْدِرُونَ|they have power|132|147|2389$عَلَىٰ|over|63|70|52$شَىْءٍ|anything|77|84|186$مِّن|from|50|65|53$فَضْلِ|(the) Bounty|105|120|8998$ٱللَّهِ‌ۙ|(of) Allah,|86|101|2$وَأَنَّ|and that|77|92|3504$ٱلْفَضْلَ|the Bounty|93|108|2129$بِيَدِ ٱللَّهِ|(is) in Allahâ€™s Hand;|148|155|3009$يُؤْتِيهِ|He gives it|90|98|3010$مَن|whom|58|73|76$يَشَآءُ‌ۚ|He wills.|74|89|867$وَٱللَّهُ|And Allah|81|96|167$ذُو ٱلْفَضْلِ|(is) the Possessor of Bounty|208|223|995$ٱلْعَظِيمِ|the Great.|88|96|996$

5100.verse: We have already sent Our messengers with clear evidences and sent down with them the Scripture and the balance that the people may maintain [their affairs] in justice. And We sent down iron, wherein is great military might and benefits for the people, and so that Allah may make evident those who support Him and His messengers unseen. Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might.

5101.verse: And We have already sent Noah and Abraham and placed in their descendants prophethood and scripture; and among them is he who is guided, but many of them are defiantly disobedient.

5102.verse: Then We sent following their footsteps Our messengers and followed [them] with Jesus, the son of Mary, and gave him the Gospel. And We placed in the hearts of those who followed him compassion and mercy and monasticism, which they innovated; We did not prescribe it for them except [that they did so] seeking the approval of Allah. But they did not observe it with due observance. So We gave the ones who believed among them their reward, but many of them are defiantly disobedient.

5103.verse: O you who have believed, fear Allah and believe in His Messenger; He will [then] give you a double portion of His mercy and make for you a light by which you will walk and forgive you; and Allah is Forgiving and Merciful.

5104.verse: [This is] so that the People of the Scripture may know that they are not able [to obtain] anything from the bounty of Allah and that [all] bounty is in the hand of Allah; He gives it to whom He wills. And Allah is the possessor of great bounty.
